sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_entitlement.EntitlementProcessorFactory</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Factory class to route entitlement request to appropriate processor</description> <name>EntitlementProcessorFactory</name> <script><![CDATA[var EntitlementProcessorFactory = Class.create(); EntitlementProcessorFactory.prototype = { initialize: function() {},
getEntitlementRequestProcessor: function(artifactType) { switch (true) { case (LicensingEngineConstants.APP_ID === artifactType): return new AppEntitlementProcessor();
case (LicensingEngineConstants.CUSTOM_TABLE === artifactType): return new CustomTableEntitlementProcessor();
case (LicensingEngineConstants.FAMILY_ID === artifactType): return new FamilyEntitlementProcessor();
case (LicensingEngineConstants.FGE_ID === artifactType): return new FGEEntitlementProcessor();
case (LicensingEngineConstants.SUPPORTED_SKU_METADATA_TYPE.indexOf(artifactType) != -1): return new SKUMetadataEntitlementProcessor(artifactType);
default: return new DefaultEntitlementProcessor(); } },
type: 'EntitlementProcessorFactory' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-02-09 09:29:51</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b1cb6f1077f421109c62f5f3cb5a9961</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>EntitlementProcessorFactory</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Licensing Engine" source="sn_entitlement">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Licensing Engine">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b1cb6f1077f421109c62f5f3cb5a9961</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-23 14:17:34</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
